channel.title: closure on ThingsDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in closure on ThingsDB documentation

item.title: call
item.description: Call a closure with optional arguments. This function does not generate an event. Function closure.call() Arguments The exact number of arguments for the closure must be given. It is not possible to assign default values to arguments but something similar can be accomplished by checking the argument within the closure. See the example below. Return value Returns the closure response. Example Example code using call: // create a greet closure greet = |name| isstr(name) ?
